text: Stuart Martin is an actor from Ayr, Scotland. He is known for his roles in Babylon, Jamestown, and Medici: Masters of Florence. Stuart studied Drama at the Royal Conservatoire of Scotland ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
